body:
Minecraft. 
Its initials are MC. 
MC.  
Miley Cyrus?
In one of Miley Cyrus' music videos, there was someone sitting on a pile of bread. 
Bread is made of wheat. 
Wheat.. agriculture?
Agriculture is the farming of plants. 
Plants are green. 
You know what else is green? The dollar bill. 
On the dollar bill, there is the symbol of the Illuminati. 
Who would have ever guessed that Minecraft was so obviously connected with the Illuminati?

Yurp, this is just a fun, creative topic to mess around with. Post your Illuminati's confirmed down below, if you want to, and make sure to be original! :3

replies.body:
AtditC is a name used by a Minecrafter
His skin consists of a multicolored question mark
He is diamond rank
The word diamond has 7 letters in it
The word AtditC has 6 letters in it
The word Illuminati has 10 letters in it
10 + 6 + 7 = 23
The Illuminati triangle has 3 sides and 1 eye in it
The Illuminati triangle is green
The word green has 5 letters in it
3 + 1 + 5 = 9
23 - 9 = 14
The word question has 8 letters in it
14 - 8 = 6
Again, the Illuminati triangle has 3 sides and 1 eye
6 - 3 = 3
3:3 = 1
The Illuminati triangle has 1 eye
AtditC is Loominaderp cunfermid.

replies.body:
Minecraft contains nine letters.
Nine contains four letters.
9+4=13
13 contains a 1 and a 3
The 3 represents three sides of a triangle
The 1 represents one eye
Triangle+1 eye=Illuminati
Minecraft is Illuminati confirmed.

Minecraft.
Avicus is a server in minecraft.
Avicus rhymes with Spartacus
Spartacus lived 2087 years ago
20 + 87 is 107
One hundred seven has 15 letters
15 years ago the world population reached 6 billion people.
6 billion has 8 zero's
6 + 8 = 14
We live in 2014
2014 has 1, 1
Illuminati has 1 eye
Minecraft has 1, I

Minecraft and Avicus are Illuminati confirmed in 2014.

replies.body: Oh, sorry, I forgot to mention that it doesn't have to only be about Minecraft; it can be about anything :3
replies.body_tagged: Oh, sorry, I forgot to mention that it doesn't have to only be about Minecraft; it can be about anything :3

replies.body:
‘Minecraft’ contains nine letters. It is a game made of cubes. The root of a cube is a square. The square root of nine is three. The Illuminati triangle has three sides. Minecraft confirmed for Illuminati.


Minecraft is a game made of cubes. A cube has six faces. ‘Minecraft’ can be broken down into two other words: ‘mine’ and ‘craft’. Six divided by two is three. The Illuminati triangle has three sides. Minecraft confirmed for Illuminati.


A spider has eight legs and eight eyes. Eight divided by eight is one. There are two variants of spider in Minecraft. Two plus one is three. The Illuminati triangle has three sides. Minecraft confirmed for Illuminati.


In Minecraft, leaves grow on trees. Trees grow from saplings. The block ID of leaves is eighteen. The block ID of a sapling is six. Eighteen divided by six is three. The Illuminati triangle has three sides. Minecraft confirmed for Illuminati.


The number of points on one stationary creeper’s body add up to twenty. Twenty plus one is twenty-one. Creepers can also become charged. ‘Charged’ contains seven letters. Twenty-one divided by seven is three. The Illuminati triangle has three sides. Minecraft confirmed for Illuminati.


Minecraft has gone through the versions of ‘Classic’, ‘Indev’, ‘Infdev’, ‘Alpha’, ‘Beta’ and ‘Full’. The combined total of all the letters in these versions is thirty-one. However, you only have to buy the game once. Thirty-one minus one is thirty. There have been six versions of Minecraft to date. Thirty minus six is twenty-four. Minecraft is a game made of cubes. A cube has eight points. Twenty-four divided by eight is three. The Illuminati triangle has three sides. Minecraft confirmed for Illuminati.


‘Minecraft’ in binary is ‘01001101 01101001 01101110 01100101 01100011 01110010 01100001 01100110 01110100’. There are thirty-six ‘1’s in this code. ‘Minecraft’ contains nine letters. Thirty-six divided by nine is four. ‘Minecraft’ is one word. Four minus one is three. The Illuminati triangle has three sides. Minecraft confirmed for Illuminati.


Endermen are the only three block high mob in Minecraft. They drop Ender Pearls which can be crafted into Eyes of Ender. The Illuminati triangle has three sides. The Illuminati triangle has an eye at its centre. Minecraft confirmed for Illuminati.

replies.body:
Penguins.
Penguins are black and white.
"black and white" is a compound.
A compound has two parts.
The part we've been missing: Sonic has two legs.
Sonic X, his real name, consists of 5 letters and the X, which as Shiro pointed out, is the Illuminati (3 sides+1 eye=4).
5+4=9
There are 3 people in the trio of Sonic's adventures: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails.
Therefore, if each member creates Sonic X's group, each one has a third of 9.
What's a third of 9? 3. The same amount of sides on the Illuminati triangle.
replies.body_tagged:
Penguins.
Penguins are black and white.
"black and white" is a compound.
A compound has two parts.
The part we've been missing: Sonic has two legs.
Sonic X, his real name, consists of 5 letters and the X, which as Shiro pointed out, is the Illuminati (3 sides+1 eye=4).
5+4=9
There are 3 people in the trio of Sonic's adventures: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails.
Therefore, if each member creates Sonic X's group, each one has a third of 9.
What's a third of 9? 3. The same amount of sides on the Illuminati triangle.

replies.body:
MinecraftMinecraft contains 9 lettersIf we put all of those nine letters into Ascii Code we get 01001101 01101001 01101110 01100101 01100011 01110010 01100001 01100110 01111010Lets say if we use some kind of operation we get X. The only operation in an Alu starting with X is Xor. So If we Xor the first with the second, the third with the fourth and so on we get 01000011. 
That number in decimal is 67. 6 + 7 = 13. 13 x 13 = 169. Hexadecimal 169 = A9. The A probably means Avicus. So if we mmultiply the number of people online on the forums while writing this with 9 we get 135. 1 + 3 + 5 = 9. The square root of nine is 3.
ILUMINATTI CONFIRMED
replies.body_tagged:

The only operation in an Alu starting with X is Xor. So If we Xor the first with the second, the third with the fourth and so on we get 01000011. 
That number in decimal is 67. 6 + 7 = 13. 13 x 13 = 169. Hexadecimal 169 = A9. The A probably means Avicus. So if we mmultiply the number of people online on the forums while writing this with 9 we get 135. 1 + 3 + 5 = 9. The square root of nine is 3.

superkai64
5 letters in super, 3 in kai, then 64.
6 + 4 = 10
10 - 3 = 7
7 x 5 = 35
Minecon
7 letters, 2 syllables.
35 - 7 = 28
28 / 2 = 14
Back to superkai64
superkai64 has 10 letters total
14 - 10 = 4
Minecon is 1 word.
4 - 1 = 3
3 sides to a triangle.

28 / 2 = 14
Back to superkai64
superkai64 has 10 letters total
14 - 10 = 4
Minecon is 1 word.
4 - 1 = 3
3 sides to a triangle.
SUPERKAI64 WAS AT MINECON TO JOIN THE ILLUMINATI!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
D00ZiE.

It has ONE lowercase letter.
It also has ONE E.
Add "Thre" to "E" and you get "Three".
Three + One = Four.
Four + 0 + 0 = .......... Four. 
Now there is only one letter left.
Four - One = 3. 
3 = Triangle, Triangle = Illuminati.

Therefore, I am illuminati.
